snippet.title: PAYDAY 2: Yakuza Character Pack Trailer
snippet.description:
Japan is a land of warriors...

The Yakuza Character Pack comes out on August 27!

Includes: 
- Jiro playable character
- Katana and Micro Uzi
- Yakuza Perk Deck
- Jiro Mask

Jiro is portrayed by Togo Igawa.

www.overkillsoftware.com
